trans-unit.source: Stores and retrieves the message encoding format of incoming and outgoing messages for the composite Web message encoder.
trans-unit.target: 存储和检索传入和传出消息的消息编码格式针对复合 Web 消息编码器。

trans-unit.source: This property allows, for example, the composite Web message formatter to know how the composite Web message encoder has encoded the message.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此属性使复合 Web 消息格式化程序可以了解复合 Web 消息编码器进行编码消息的方式。

trans-unit.source: Objects that implement this interface are added by value to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties%2A> with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty.Name> providing the access key.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口的对象通过值添加到<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties%2A>与<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty.Name>提供访问密钥。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty.Name> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty"></xref> class with a specified format.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty"></xref>类指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: The format cannot be set to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentFormat"></xref> value in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 格式不能设置为<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentFormat"></xref>构造函数中的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current instance of the current property.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前属性的当前实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty> interface that is a copy of the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty"></xref>.
Gets the format used for the message body.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于消息正文的格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentFormat"></xref> that specifies the format used for the message body.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentFormat"> </xref> ，它指定用于消息正文的格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the property.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty> object must have the name "WebBodyFormatMessageProperty" as its key in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageProperties> collection for the value to be accessed and used as a processing annotation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty>对象必须具有名称"WebBodyFormatMessageProperty"作为中其键<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageProperties>值才能被访问并用作处理批注的集合。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageProperties> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebBodyFormatMessageProperty>

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the property and the encoding format used when constructed.
trans-unit.target: 返回的属性和构造时使用的编码格式的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns "WebBodyFormatMessageProperty: EncodingFormat={0}", where {0} is <xref uid="langword_csharp_WebContentFormat.ToString()" name="WebContentFormat.ToString()" href=""></xref>, which specifies the encoding format used.
trans-unit.target: 返回"WebBodyFormatMessageProperty: EncodingFormat = {0}"，其中 {0} 是<xref uid="langword_csharp_WebContentFormat.ToString()" name="WebContentFormat.ToString()" href=""> </xref>，它指定使用的编码格式。
